name: playwright-title-service
description: Playwright service for extracting page titles on Google Cloud Run

scripts.deploy: export PROJECT_ID=chefswiz && export REGION=europe-west1 && export SERVICE=playwright-title && export IMG_TAG=$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) && export IMAGE=gcr.io/$PROJECT_ID/$SERVICE:$IMG_TAG && gcloud builds submit --tag $IMAGE && gcloud run deploy $SERVICE --image $IMAGE --region $REGION --platform managed --allow-unauthenticated --memory 2Gi --concurrency 1 --timeout 60
